Text:
function RIR_EP04_20()
    -- .結-2【12月第4週】「姫選挙-姫ギャルｖｓ姫騎士-」
    SaveData.Title = "姫選挙-姫ギャルｖｓ姫騎士-"

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024db")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    -- //校舎前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav")

    MSG([[ ――Thirty minutes before the princess election between Lira and Daria began. ]])

    -- //BU：リラ（笑顔）、エリカ（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)


PLAY_VOICE("lira_0932.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】笑顔
 "I’ll protect you. Trust me, Erika." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0933.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】笑顔
 "So please, be quiet for a while." ]])

    -- //SE：縛る音
PLAY_SE("SEb035.wav")
WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1512.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】焦り
 "L-Lira-san!? Why did you suddenly tie me up with rope!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0934.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】ウインク
 "The ‘Morning Glory’ technique you taught me—I worked hard to master it. Well, the rope I used is more like climbing gear though." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0935.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】真剣
 "I have a really bad feeling about the next princess election. If Erika participates, something irreversible might happen." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0936.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】通常
 "So sorry, but you have to stay put in this patch of grass. Got it?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1513.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】焦り
 "B-But I have to beat Daria-san! If I don’t, big sister Marika will—" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0937.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】真剣
 "I’ll win instead." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1514.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "...What did you just say?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0938.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】ウインク
 "I said I’ll beat Daria instead of you. You just stay quietly praying in a corner of the bushes." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0939.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】苦笑
 "And if something irreversible happens to me, just laugh. Because the dumbest one was Lira Hoozuki." ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1515.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "N-No! You don’t have to do this for someone like me—" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1516.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Wait, Lira-san! Lira-san!!!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM12.wav")

    MSG([[ By the time I reached the auditorium, the princess election had already started. ]])

    MSG([[ On the stage, Lira and Daria faced each other. Between them, Hermes casually stepped in with light steps to explain the rules. ]])

    -- //BG：選挙ステージ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024db")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：エルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0424.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】笑顔
 "Okay, let me explain the rules this time <sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> It’s a little special, so listen closely~ <sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0425.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】ウインク
 "The theme of this princess election is ‘Martial Arts’! Daria-chan and Lira-chan will have a sparring match starting now!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0426.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】笑顔
 "Oh, ‘kumite’ means two people exchanging techniques one-on-one! It’s originally a karate term, but it doesn’t have to be limited to karate skills!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0427.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】真剣
 "Actually, punching and kicking are a no-go! There’s a soft mat underneath, but dangerous throws are also forbidden!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0428.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】笑顔
 "In the princess election, cuteness is justice <sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Not cute is a no-no! Without injuring your opponent, fight cutely, elegantly, and beautifully~ <sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ba")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0940.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】真剣
 "What are the judging criteria for the match? Without clear standards, how can you decide?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0429.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】ウインク
 "Good question, Lira! Actually, that’s the most special thing about this election!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0430.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】苦笑
 "I’m not that knowledgeable about ‘martial arts,’ so I decided to ask the audience to be the judges! <sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0431.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】笑顔
 "I’ll stop the match when I think it’s the right moment, so everyone, vote for whoever you think is ‘cute’ on your tablets! <sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0432.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】笑顔
 "When I’ve stopped the match three times, the one with the most votes wins this princess election! <sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

    -- SE：歓声（MAX）
PLAY_SE("SEf001.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ The audience erupted at Hermes’ explanation. No strikes, and heavy restrictions on throws in the kumite. ]])

    MSG([[ Moreover, since many judges have no martial arts experience, flashy finishing moves become necessary. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s a condition that makes a normal match very difficult. Even I can’t avoid struggling under these rules. ]])

    MSG([[ Lira, who lacks martial arts experience, is in an even tougher spot. If things continue, Daria will torture her in front of the public with her sidewinder techniques. ]])

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1517.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "If I act now, it’s not too late. I have to rush onto the stage and stop Lira!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    STOP_SE("SEf001.wav",1000)
    -- //BU：ウラン（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0432.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "Please wait, Erika-san." ]])

    MSG([[ I turned around to see Uran-san there. Without waiting for my reply, she continued speaking. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0433.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "I understand your feelings, but let’s trust Lira-san." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0434.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】悲しみ
 "If you go on stage now and it turns out your poor health is a lie, Lira will be criticized as someone who desecrated the princess election." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1518.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】焦り
 "But the opponent is Daria-san! It’s reckless, and no one can win by jumping in like that!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ My words were echoed on the screen. ]])

    -- //CI：得票率 リラ 20　対 ダリア 80 130
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI130a")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ The difference is overwhelming. Some of Uran’s knights and I voted, but the vast majority support Daria. ]])

    MSG([[ Which is natural. Even if the rules allow interference, emotionally it’s unacceptable. ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1519.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "Besides, the kumite is about to start. You understand what will happen if a novice like Lira fights Daria, don’t you, Uran-san!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0435.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】悲しみ
 "In the worst case, it won’t just be an injury. And I don’t believe Daria will go easy right now." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1520.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "If you understand that—" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0436.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "But Lira herself understands the risk better than anyone. She’s smart. Normally, she wouldn’t take such a risk." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0437.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "So why would she step onto the stage, ready to face disgrace?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0438.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】真剣
 "Erika-san… It’s to protect you, isn’t it? Are you going to trample on Lira’s resolve?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1521.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "...!?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1522.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】悲しみ
 "For me." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Uran is right. If I go up now, the situation won’t change. ]])

    MSG([[ I’d only ruin Lira’s resolve and put her in danger. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1523.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】悲しみ
 "Uran-san, I’m sorry… I was wrong." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Suppressing my urge to rush up the stage, I clenched my fists tightly. ]])

    MSG([[ So I could bear even a little of Lira’s pain. Until my skin tears and bleeds, I’ll give everything. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0439.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "It’s okay. Lira will surely win. She didn’t step on stage without a chance of winning." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0440.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "Now, lift your head. Let’s pray and cheer together for Lira’s victory." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1524.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "...Yes!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ I joined my hands as if praying and stared at Lira facing Daria on stage. ]])

    MSG([[ Then I cheered her as loudly as I could. ]])

    MSG([[ For Lira, who faces a lonely fight, my voice—even if just a little— I hoped it would reach her. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)

    -- //BG：選挙ステージ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024db")
    -- //BU：エルメス（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0433.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】真剣
 "Lira-chan, Daria-chan, are you both ready? Then let’s begin~~~!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0434.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】ウインク
 "The Super Gal Knight Battle is starting~!" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Hermes bounced like a rabbit and left backstage. ]])

    -- //CG：ステージ上のリラ（決意・対ダリア）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVb001aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    -- //CI：リラBU（真剣）目元切り抜き 038
    LAYER_LOAD(210,"BG024db")
    LAYER_SCALE(210,200,200)
    LAYER_EFFECT(210, 7)
    LAYER_POSITION(210,470,-170)
    LAYER_LOAD(211,"BUL_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(211,0,-115)
    -- //CI：ダリアBU（真剣）目元切り抜き 010
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG024db")
    LAYER_SCALE(200,200,200)
    LAYER_EFFECT(200, 7)
    LAYER_POSITION(200,-200,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,65)

    SET_CUTIN_02_03_S(310, -50, 500)

    MSG([[ I met the fierce gaze of Daria Himegami head-on. ]])

    MSG([[ For an ordinary student, that piercing stare would be overwhelming. ]])

    MSG([[ I already started regretting throwing myself into such a hopeless fight. ]])

    RESET_CUTIN_02_03(310, -50, 500)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0383.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "One warning: as a beginner, you probably can’t even take a proper fall." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0384.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Don’t resist unnecessarily; just focus on receiving the techniques. Otherwise, you might really die." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0941.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Thanks for the advice, but enough talk—come at me already." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0942.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Or is your sidewinder technique not really martial arts but just chatter? No wonder you always wear those funny white clothes like a comedian." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0385.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "...Hah." ]])

    MSG([[ As Daria sighed, I felt the atmosphere around her shift. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0943.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】真剣
 (Here it comes.) ]])

    MSG([[ I braced myself for the next strike. ]])

    MSG([[ Come on, then. Thanks to Uran-senpai’s training, I can resist somewhat. ]])

    MSG([[ Even if I get hit hard, I’ll fight back stubbornly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0386.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "You’re way too annoying." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",300,false)

    -- //CI：ダリアBU（真剣）目元切り抜き 010
    -- //CG：ステージ上のリラ（ダリア接近）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVb001aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BU_DAR01ba")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 300,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG000aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,-30)
    SET_CUTIN_01_S(200, 300)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0944.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Ha—" ]])

    MSG([[ —That was fast. I didn’t even have time to breathe it in. ]])

    RESET_CUTIN_00()

    -- //CI：ダリアBU（真剣）目元切り抜き・上下逆転 097
    -- //CG：ステージ上のリラ（ダリア接近）上下逆転
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVb001aa")
    LAYER_ANGLE(LAYER_BG,180)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BU_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-570,160)
    LAYER_ANGLE(50,10)
    LAYER_ANGLE(50,180)

    -- LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG000aa")
    -- LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_DAR01ba")
    -- LAYER_ANGLE(201,180)
    -- LAYER_POSITION(201,0,135)
    -- SET_CUTIN_00_S(0,-100)

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ Daria’s face was suddenly right in front of me, then the world flipped upside down. ]])

    -- //SE：床に叩きつけられる音
PLAY_SE("SEc018.wav")
WAIT(100)

    -- RESET_CUTIN_00()
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask031",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0945.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Ugh...!" ]])

    MSG([[ I was slammed onto the floor on my back without any reaction. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //CG：スポットライトの光
    LAYER_LOAD(50, "CI131a")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,true)

    MSG([[ I tried to break my fall instinctively, but my back felt like it was burning. It was hot. ]])

    MSG([[ My vision wobbled; I couldn’t stand properly and stared up at the ceiling. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0435.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "S-Stop, stop! That fall wasn’t allowed! Lira-chan, are you okay? Can you hear my voice? How many fingers do you see?" ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes-senpai’s blurry figure appeared in my vision. ]])

    MSG([[ Ah… the whole world is twisting and melting. ]])

    MSG([[ —I have to stand. I have to stand. I knew from the start I’d get hurt like this. ]])

    MSG([[ I tell myself that, but my body won’t listen. ]])

    MSG([[ My body trembles and won’t steady at the thought of getting hurt again if I stand. ]])

PLAY_SE("SEf002.wav",500,true)
    -- //：特殊選択肢
    -- 　⇒【立って、リラさん！】

    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP04_1_RIR,"アタシを奮い立たせる声は？")

STOP_SE("SEf002.wav")

    if result == false then
        NazenanoBokuhime("EP_BAD_08", "RIR_EP04_20")
        return
    end

    MSG([[ At that moment, I heard Erika’s voice. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0946.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 (Ah, so she escaped from those ropes... She’s amazing.) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0947.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Ha ha, hahaha..." ]])

    MSG([[ I laughed unintentionally at my friend's ridiculous actions. ]])

    MSG([[ What am I doing? ]])

    MSG([[ Erika kept enduring the pain no matter how many times she was slammed down. I’ve been by her side to see that determination. ]])

    MSG([[ Just because I got slammed down once—I can’t lie down forever! ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0948.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Nyaaa, ruaaaaaaah!!!" ]])

    -- //CG：ステージ上のリラ（苦悶・対ダリア）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVb001ab")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask032" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0387.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Sh-She stood up...!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0436.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "She stood upーーーーーー!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0020")
    MSG([[
    【Erika・Uran】
 "Lira-san stood up!!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0949.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Sorry, I only got two hours of sleep last night and just nodded off for a moment, yeah, just two hours of sleep." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0950.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Alright, Daria-senpai, let’s continue the showcase. Next time, I’ll really surprise you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0388.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "...Fine. But next time, it’ll hurt more. Prepare yourself." ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
